summary: Dark, Black Mirror y lo que llega a Netflix en junio
title: Dark, Black Mirror y lo que llega a Netflix en junio
body:
Dark, Black Mirror y lo que llega a Netflix en junio

Estamos prácticamente a la mitad del año, y con ello las cosas empiezan a ponerse buenas en cuestión de nuevas temporadas y contenidos que llegarán a Netflix.

Las nuevas temporadas de Dark y Black Mirror son las que encabezan los contenidos, pero también tenemos cosas interesantes como el final de Marvel’s Jessica Jones.

Los contenidos que llegan este mes de junio son:

  • DARK TEMPORADA 2 Disponible…

View On WordPress

summary: I’m so hyped for Aggretsuko season 2!!!! I like to draw the characters as humans. Also this is supposed to be Haida and Retsuko...
caption:
I’m so hyped for Aggretsuko season 2!!!!

I like to draw the characters as humans. Also this is supposed to be Haida and Retsuko hugging I guess. Also this Anai guy needs to get out of the way. The english trailer isn’t out yet but the Japanese one had subtitles so thank you!

reblog.comment:
I’m so hyped for Aggretsuko season 2!!!!

I like to draw the characters as humans. Also this is supposed to be Haida and Retsuko hugging I guess. Also this Anai guy needs to get out of the way. The english trailer isn’t out yet but the Japanese one had subtitles so thank you!

trail.content_raw:
I’m so hyped for Aggretsuko season 2!!!!

I like to draw the characters as humans. Also this is supposed to be Haida and Retsuko hugging I guess. Also this Anai guy needs to get out of the way. The english trailer isn’t out yet but the Japanese one had subtitles so thank you!

blog.name: bebbls-craft-blog
blog.title: 🌸Event In Progress🌸Inbox: 0🌸
blog.description:
Aesthetics, Moodboards, icons, wallpapers/lockscreens, pride flags? You want it, I’ll make it! My ask box is always open and I accept requests usually themed on fictional characters but other themes/aesthetics will work as well!

This blog is not necessarily MOGAI though I have no problems with making icons based on such unless the identity is harmful in any way! I will not however, make flags based on real people/things that make me uncomfortable/things that could harm others. DNI: Terfs, truscum, racists, sexists, anti-lgbtqa+, aphobes, maps, ddlg, fetish, fujoshi, pedos.

tags: you teased us all in the christmas special and now not even a second of them in the trailer
summary: Now don’t get me wrong, I am just as thrilled to see a season 2 trailer as everyone else. But I have to ask... WHERE ARE MY...
caption:
Now don’t get me wrong, I am just as thrilled to see a season 2 trailer as everyone else.


But I have to ask…

WHERE ARE MY BOYS?!?!?!
